title: St Johnstone 0-2 Hearts: Analysis
title_page: St Johnstone 0-2 Hearts: Analysis - BBC Sport
maintext:
Jack Herrall, BBC Sport Scotland
For St Johnstone, their strongest chances game from set-pieces with theory strength allowing them to dominate in the box
More traditional build-up play wasn’t their best option this afternoon but that’s also due to Hearts’ defensive play.
Ultimately, they really need to find a win from somewhere to restore some confidence around the club at the moment.
